column4: anybody got an idea how i can fix this problem: i just installed a new video card a Geforce 8400GS from Nvidia and i cant play any video format the screen is black i only hear sound tried many formats and every format is same result anyone got an idea?
you need the drivers?
i have the same card
i installed al Nvidia drivers i got version 185
sudo nvidia-settings?
to set the resolution
i got my resolution on 1360 x 768
is that the resolution you want?
yes thats the resolution i want;)
cool
but do you know how to fix my problem?
i had to edit my xorg.conf
and add Device  "Default Device" and save
if you got the same as i do can you send me a copy of yours or tell me how to adjust it?
yes, please do send me it
a sec how do i send files with Xchat?
!pastebin
pasetbin, aerora
thiebaude:damn now my mouse is trippy
im going to restart something snapped in my pc:(
brb
ok
